content:
Dear all,

On Tuesday the 23rd of September, we will meet again for the ItaCa Fest. We will start at 3:00 PM (Italian time).

As usual, you can find all the relevant information (schedule, abstracts, and Zoom link) at the following page:
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/fests/fest25.html

Here is the list of speakers for this episode:
• B. M. Bumpus – Categories, Dynamic Programming, CSPs and Beyond;
• R. Van Belle – Algebras of the Giry monad;
• V. Iwaniack – Two-way automata and tree automata as functors.

Best wishes,
Giacomo

Dear all,

On Tuesday the 21st of October, we will meet again for the ItaCa Fest. We will start at 3:00 PM (Italian time).
As usual, you can find all the relevant information (schedule, abstracts, and Zoom link) at the following page:
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/fests/fest25.html

Here is the list of speakers for this episode:
• S. Fujii – Nerves of T-categories;
• N. Arkor – Convolution via exponentiation;
• R. Lucyshyn-Wright – Weighted pullbacks in V-graded categories and universal quantification in V-actegories.

Best wishes,
Giacomo
(This will be starting in about 50 minutes.)

Dear all,

On Tuesday the 18th of November, we will meet for the last ItaCa Fest of 2025. We will start at 3:00 PM (Italian time).
As usual, you can find all the relevant information (schedule, abstracts, and Zoom link) at the following page:
https://progetto-itaca.github.io/fests/fest25.html

Here is the list of speakers for this episode:
• Paul Taylor – A Categorical Replacement for Replacement;
• Umberto Tarantino – Ultracategories via Kan extensions of relative monads;
• Ettore Aldrovandi – Biextensions and Monoidal (2-)Categories.

Best wishes,
Giacomo
